name: Motorbike Driving: Real Motor Bike GP Simulator
name_original: Motorbike Driving: Real Motor Bike GP Simulator
description:
Be surprised by the Japanese beauty and dominate the roads of Tokyo!

Embark on an amazing MotoGP race and try to drive more kilometres than the other drivers.

Choose your favourite motorcycle and feel the adrenaline of a wild asphalt simulator race!

Dodge all the super GP motorbikes and cars appearing on your road!

Do not let your bike run out of gasoline! Only the best simulator drivers make it till the end of the motoGP race!

The faster you drive your GP Bike, the greater the distance you'll travel!

Enjoy the graphics that recreate the skyscrapers, temples and city of Tokyo in an unparalleled motorbike driving game!

Do not forget to follow us on our social networks to find out about all our news!

Follow us on Twitter: @LabCave
Give us a like on Facebook: www.facebook.com/LabCaveGames
